prompt: A high-quality 3D cartoon introduction of a small Indian boy named Golu in a vibrant village. Golu has tan skin, large expressive eyes, short messy black hair, and wears a simple yellow cotton tunic with blue shorts. He is standing in a bright, cheerful village square with thatched-roof houses and a clear blue sky. The art style is reminiscent of modern animated films with soft, warm lighting.
